back_flavor: When André turned 13, his parents scrounged up just enough money to buy him a ticket to the Central Paris Theatre. Enamored by the art form, André quickly became obsessed with the silver screen, working tirelessly to act his way to Hollywood. There, while filming A Cosmic Journey, he experienced inexplicable and world-altering happenings. As the lines between reality and fantasy began to blur in his mind, his peer and friend, Betsy Baxter, suggested a change of scenery. At her recommendation, André packed up and moved to the small town of Arkham, Massachusetts for a much-needed break.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Know the Exit, Know the Line, Know the Scene, Weight of the World, 1 random basic weakness.
deck_requirements: size:30, card:60352, card:60353, card:60354, card:60355, random:subtype:basicweakness
name: André Patel
text:
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more during your turn: You may take an additional action this turn. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Gain 1 resource.

name: Know the Exit
text:
André Patel deck only.
While this card is committed to an attack or an evasion, it gains [wild] [wild].

name: Know the Line
text:
André Patel deck only.
While this card is committed to a skill test on a scenario card, it gains [wild] [wild].

name: Know the Scene
text:
André Patel deck only.
While this card is committed to an investigation or parley, it gains [wild] [wild].

name: Weight of the World
text: Revelation - Put Weight of the World into play in your threat area. Forced - When you fail a skill test while Weight of the World is in play, take 1 horror and shuffle it back into your deck.

name: Center Stage
text: Limit 1 per investigator. Uses (3 renown). If there is no renown on Center Stage, discard it. [fast] During a skill test, spend 1 renown and exhaust Center Stage: You get +1 skill value for each action you have spent this round (including this one, if this is triggered during one of your actions).

flavor: "I am certain this city will know of your accomplishments."
name: Marcus Sengstacke
text: You gain 1 additional resource during the upkeep phase. Forced - After you fail a skill test: Deal 1 horror to Marcus Sengstacke.

name: Polished Cane
text: [action]: Fight ([combat]). Add your [agility] to your [combat] for this attack. If this attack succeeds by 2 or more against a non-[[Elite]] enemy, you may exhaust Polished Cane to automatically evade that enemy.
